column5: A few CRAA videos of work done by volunteers! Also a few other videos done related to the Credit I found. Check them out. Cool stuff.  CRAA Hatchery    CRAA wild baby steelhead and adults - June 2009    CRAA stream rehab project    CRAA large tree planting - 2009 site    CRAA fish ladder video (Toronto Star)  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K0cqo1JHGvs  Atlantic salmon collection and tagging 2008 on Credit (Ulivio)    Steelhead in a Credit Trib 2009 vid (unknown)    Enjoy,  The club is always lookibng for volenteers if your interested let us know

Good bunch of videos  Seems the CRAA has done some good work there, not bad considering most of the river flows through heavily populated areas. Lots of work by a few has made a big difference, hopefully in the future the MNR could take some credit.
How about the upper humber? I seen alot of work being done by th 407.
Looks like the CRAA are doing a great job!  I'm just wondering if i could volunteer to get some community hours for High School?  Send me a PM if you prefer.  Thanks.
tibbs always happy to sign the sheets.....www.craa.on.ca for info on when where and how to volenteer
I think it has to do with Kipling ave. I believe they are extending it to the 407.    Rich.
